programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Industrial Age
programme.desc: A tour of Britains mining heritage takes Fred from Cornwall to Scotland, where he visits sites of lead, slate, tin and coal extraction. Along the way, the machine-mad former steeplejack has a chance to man a winding engine and descends a mine shaft while strapped to the top of the cage

programme.title: Railways: The Making of a Nation
programme.desc: Liz McIvor examines how the railways enabled people to live farther away from the places where they worked, visiting London and the south east of England, the nations largest commuter zone

programme.title: An Art Lovers Guide
programme.desc: Historian Janina Ramirez and art critic Alastair Sooke embark on cultural city breaks, offering insights into the most famous locations and uncovering hidden gems and untold stories to reveal how religion, revolution and trailblazing individuals can shape the art - and soul - of a metropolis. They begin by examining the art and design of the Dutch capital Amsterdam, along the way discovering how its culture reflects the liberal attitudes, appetite for global trade and love of home comforts that helped shape the character of this city

programme.title: Call My Bluff
programme.desc: Robert Robinson oversees another duel of words and wit as Frank Muir, Anna Massey and Godfrey Smith take on Arthur Marshall, Sally Magnusson and Peter Egan. First broadcast in 1984

programme.title: Face the Music
programme.desc: Joseph Cooper invites viewers to match their musical wits against panellists Joyce Grenfell, Robin Ray and Patrick Moore. With guest musician Joan Cross. First broadcast in 1973

programme.title: Arena
programme.sub-title: Billie Holiday: The Long Night of Lady Day
programme.desc: A 1984 profile of the jazz singer, from her traumatic childhood in Baltimore to her premature death in a New York hospital at the age of 44, told in the words of her closest friends and colleagues. The programme features a number of filmed performances and includes classics such as God Bless the Child, Dont Explain and Fine and Mellow

programme.title: Imagine
programme.sub-title: Marina Abramovic: The Ugly Duckling - Imagine
programme.desc: The performance artist invites Alan Yentob into her home, opens up her enormous personal archive, and travels back to her birthplace of Belgrade. Abramovic talks about her family and growing up in communist Yugoslavia, where she fell in love with performance art and became one of its most outrageous and celebrated practitioners, and discusses turning her life into art

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Industrial Age
programme.desc: A tour of Britains mining heritage takes Fred from Cornwall to Scotland, where he visits sites of lead, slate, tin and coal extraction. Along the way, the machine-mad former steeplejack has a chance to man a winding engine and descends a mine shaft while strapped to the top of the cage

programme.title: An Art Lovers Guide

They begin by examining the art and design of the Dutch capital Amsterdam, along the way discovering how its culture reflects the liberal attitudes, appetite for global trade and love of home comforts that helped shape the character of this city

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Industrial Age
programme.desc: Fred visits the North East, a region rich in transport history, to explore the development of Britains railways, from the first steam locomotives to the record-breaking Mallard. A visit to Yorks National Railway Museum offers the chance to ride a replica of Stephensons Rocket, while at Ffestiniog Railway he learns about the computer-aided design process used for new locomotives

programme.title: Railways: The Making of a Nation
programme.desc: Thanks to the advent of rail, moving produce around at speed suddenly became possible, allowing fresh meat, wet fish, dairy, fruit and vegetables to be widely available. With a new system of rapid transport it was now possible for London to enjoy food supplies from all corners of the nation. As Liz McIvor reveals, Victorian men and women developed a taste for one particular dish that would be popular with the masses for generations to come - fish and chips

programme.title: The Good Life
programme.desc: Tom and Barbara make a small profit and spend the money on a loom, while Margo persuades Jerry to buy her a spinning wheel. Self-sufficiency comedy, starring Richard Briers and Felicity Kendal

programme.title: Yes, Prime Minister
programme.desc: On his arrival at Number 10, Jim Hacker is confronted by a confusing nuclear deterrent problem, made more difficult by Sir Humphreys constant meddling. The new PM soon realises his powers do not stretch to domestic affairs. Political comedy, starring Paul Eddington and Nigel Hawthorne

programme.title: Henry VIII: Patron or Plunderer?
programme.desc: Part one of two. Historian Jonathan Foyle examines the often contradictory character of the Tudor monarch. Henry ordered the killing of writers and the demolition of ancient monasteries during his reign, yet was a cultured man who brought the Renaissance to England with a major building programme, tapestry collection and genuine love of the arts

programme.title: Storyville
programme.desc: Following small-town librarians in Granbury, Texas, who have found themselves at the center of a large-scale movement to defend intellectual freedom of information. Theyre fighting against legislative book bans in their hometown

programme.title: The Making of Spain
programme.desc: Simon Sebag Montefiore explores the history of Spain, beginning with the countrys early years, when Iberia was a minor province of Carthage - then the most coveted of Romes colonies - through to Spains Muslim age and the Cordoba Caliphate

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Industrial Age

programme.title: Breakfast
programme.desc: A round-up of national and international news, plus current affairs, arts and entertainment, and weather

programme.title: Morning Live
programme.desc: Gethin Jones and Louise Minchin present the weekday magazine show featuring a mixture of topical discussion and expert advice for viewers

programme.title: Crimewatch Live
programme.desc: Rav Wilding and Steph McGovern present appeals for information from the public about crimes around the country. They begin with a heartfelt plea from the mother of 19-year-old Ellis Cox, who was shot in Merseyside in 2024. Plus, the nationwide hunt for a couple who went on the run with their newborn baby

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: Martin Roberts, Tommy Walsh and Dion Dublin follow the fortunes of more properties being sold at auction. Martin is in Folkestone, Kent, to visit a two-bed maisonette taken on by a builder with an interesting hobby, Tommy is in Norwich to see a grade two listing with bags of charm and potential, while Dion is in Wigan, Greater Manchester, to see a three-bed terrace riddled with damp but with great development potential

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: David Harper hosts as Kate Bliss and Thomas Forrester help two teams scour Builth Wells antiques fair and pick up bargains to sell for profit at auction. Bank managers and friends Rose and Sharon on the red team find a rusty planter in the shape of a bicycle while couple Rae and Henry on the blue team are fascinated by a ceramic bed warmer

programme.title: BBC News at One; Weather
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: BBC Newsline; Weather
programme.desc: Local news worth watching from across Northern Ireland

programme.title: BBC News at One; Weather
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Trace, Track, Get My Car Back
programme.desc: Documentary following teams of investigators who employ trackers using hi-tech methods to hunt down stolen vehicles. Tracker Neil and his team are closing in on a Land Rover linked to a spate of street robberies in Manchester. With the car in their sights, they call for police back-up

programme.title: Amanda and Alans Italian Job
programme.desc: Amanda Holden and Alan Carr set about renovating the bathrooms. Amanda has big plans converting one of the medieval tower rooms into a double height sumptuous en-suite complete with a Botticelli mural, roll-top bath and a gold resin floor, while Alan has the challenging task of transforming the small-sized bathroom into a minimalist wet room. Things dont get off to the best of starts for Alan as he dismantles the old toilet, while Amanda discovers the ceiling she hoped to take down holds the tower together. To lift their spirits, the duo send time at the picturesque medieval town of San Gimignano

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: City-dwelling families, couples and individuals set out to find their ideal rural retreats with the help of a property expert

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: Sonnaz Nooranvary restores a pair of cinema seats from 1947 and Kirsten Ramsay repairs a ceramic Buddha statue that has been passed through the same family for 70 years. Tim Gunn is tasked with bringing a cherished polo bike and mallet back to its former glory

programme.title: The Inner Circle
programme.desc: Amanda Holden hosts the quiz show where players must outsmart each other to win big. Six players are each randomly assigned a secret stash of cash, anything between zero and £4,000. Each player only knows their own value before being thrown into a battle of wits, nerve, and strategic gameplay across a series of challenging rounds

programme.title: Pointless
programme.desc: Alexander Armstrong and Angela Rippon co-host the quiz in which four pairs of contestants have to score the fewest points possible by giving the least obvious answers to questions posed to 100 people before the show. At the end of each round, the team with the most points is eliminated until the final two pairs battle for a cash prize

programme.desc: The latest headlines

programme.title: The One Show
programme.desc: Alex Jones and Roman Kemp present the first visit of the week to the One Show studio, featuring the usual mix of topical stories and celebrity chat

programme.title: EastEnders
programme.desc: The Mitchells join forces to support Callum, Harrys happiness is short-lived when a worrying situation comes to light, and Suki extends an olive branch

programme.title: Panorama
programme.desc: EastEnders actor Kellie Bright meets parents who say theyre exhausted by the fight to get the right education for their autistic children. She follows three families who are applying to their councils for an Education, Health, and Care Plan, a crucial document which says where a child goes to school and what extra support they should get. Kellie learns that a crisis in funding for children with special educational needs and disabilities is contributing to financial trouble for many local authorities and that the government is promising reform. Filmed over six months and drawing on her own experience as a mother to an autistic son, Kellie helps the children explain in their own words why they find school so hard and finds out what they and their parents think would help them to cope better and thrive

programme.title: Blue Lights
programme.desc: A car crash has traumatic consequences for Aisling, while the fallout creates a deadly situation for the section. Grace turns to child protection to try to help Lindsay

programme.title: BBC News at Ten
programme.desc: A round-up of todays headlines

programme.title: Stitched Up? Surgery in the Sun
programme.desc: Aoife Moore is in Istanbul with Martin who is getting Turkey teeth and Chloe, who is there for a boob job. She also speaks to Lauren who is undergoing emergency surgery at home after her mummy makeover abroad led to sepsis

programme.title: Trying
programme.desc: With the adoption panel only a week away, Nikki decides to get both families on board and hosts a party for both her and Jasons parents

programme.title: Trying
programme.desc: Nikki is annoyed that Freddy is making himself at home since being thrown out by Erica. Meanwhile, with the help of adoption agency, it is time for Nikki and Jason to face the adoption panel.

programme.title: Have I Got News for You
programme.desc: Victoria Coren Mitchell fronts the satirical current affairs quiz, as it returns for its 70th run. Team captains Ian Hislop and Paul Merton are joined by actress Sheila Hancock and actor and comedian Miles Jupp to poke fun at the weeks headlines

programme.title: The Celebrity Inner Circle
programme.desc: Amanda Holden hosts the quiz show where contestants and their celebrity partners must outsmart each other to win a cash prize. Featuring Kaye Adams, Jeff Brazier, Lauren Layfield, Zara McDermott, Jenny Powell and Lou Sanders

programme.title: Trace, Track, Get My Car Back
programme.desc: The work of trackers using hi-tech methods to hunt down stolen vehicles. Richard races to find a stolen Audi before its dismantled. According to the vehicles tracker, its being stored in a garage in Newport, south Wales. At Felixstowe port, stolen vehicle examiner Adam discovers a shipping container crammed full of stolen car parts. His job is to piece together the parts and identify the stolen vehicles, one by one

programme.title: Amanda and Alans Italian Job
programme.desc: Amanda Holden meets her match as she aims to turn the dark second bedroom into a country chic boudoir, inspired by the Tuscan sunrise. To help bring her vision to life, local friends Luca and Alessandro invite her and co-renovator Alan Carr to visit their recently renovated 19th-century farmhouse to gather inspiration. Keen to create a piece de resistance, Amanda ropes in Scott to build a bespoke headboard and takes her first steps into the world of upholstery. Meanwhile, Alan secretly signs up to a painting masterclass with local artist Tony to surprise Amanda with a showpiece of his own

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: A London couple who want a less hectic lifestyle ask for Steve Browns help to find a peaceful paradise in Yorkshire on a budget of £425,000. Steve also pays a visit to the North York Moors National Park to find out about the work being done to ensure the park is accessible to everyone

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: A school clock gifted by Florence Nightingale is revived, including a full facelift, and a special saxophone receives the utmost care from the team

programme.title: The Inner Circle

programme.desc: Alex Jones and Lauren Laverne present another mix of nationwide reports and live studio-based chat

programme.title: EastEnders
programme.desc: Callum is forced to admit the truth, George inadvertently makes a situation worse, Teddy opts for a risky decision

programme.title: Stacey and Joe
programme.desc: Teddy has made it through the crucial post-operative phase and is allowed to come home from the vet. With an already hectic work and home life, how will Stacey and Joe adapt to caring for a poorly pooch? Joe arrives back home, only to be left with a long list of jobs by Stacey, who also has a new beehive. But the most exciting thing are the Baftas, for which Stacey has been nominated in two categories. Will she be bringing any trophies back to Pickle Cottage?

programme.title: Waterloo Road
programme.desc: Dwayne reaches breaking point as he struggles to cope with accumulating pressures. Stella finds it hard to separate the personal from the professional as she makes a ruthless decision in the wake of last weeks devastating events. Corals high hopes of a job-share are quickly dashed when Nishas actions leave her in the lurch

programme.title: BBC News at Ten
programme.desc: A round-up of todays headlines

programme.title: Spotlight
programme.desc: This summer, a wave of racist and sectarian violence in North Belfast, Ballymena and beyond forced people out of their homes into an uncertain future. Conor Spackman speaks to some of those who had to flee and one woman who says she and her children will be staying put

programme.title: Waterloo Road
programme.desc: The staff and students swap the school for the estate as a community clean?up brings back familiar faces - though not everything goes to plan when some cave in to temptation. Desperation drives Schuey back to his criminal past, with disastrous consequences for Mike, and Noel is left reeling from a revelation by Stace

programme.title: The Turning
programme.desc: A woman quits her teaching job to be a governess for a young heiress who witnessed her parents tragic deaths, and ends up also teaching the girls problematic brother after he is sent home from boarding school. The tutor has some strange, unexplainable experiences in the house and begins to suspect there is more to their story than meets the eye. Modern adaptation of Henry Jamess gothic horror 1898 novella The Turn of the Screw, starring Mackenzie Davis, Finn Wolfhard, Brooklynn Prince and Joely Richardson

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.sub-title: Horrible Histories: Orrible Oliver Cromwell Special
programme.desc: A look at the life of the 17th-century military and political leader, following him as he challenges Charles I in the English Civil War, and ultimately orders the kings execution. Plus, the programme meets a bunch of oddly named Puritan soldiers, and the great writers Shakespeare and Milton square up for a word battle

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.sub-title: Horrible Histories: Tricky Queen Vicky Special
programme.desc: The life and times of Queen Victoria, following her as she ascends the throne at 18, marries her true love Albert, and has to put up with the open sewers at Buckingham Palace. The programme also catches up with Australian outlaw Ned Kelly, and discovers plans for the Great Hedge of India. Starring Sarah Hadland

programme.title: The Catch Up
programme.desc: A round-up of the days news

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May build their own versions of motorhomes and set off for a bank holiday weekend in the West Country to try out their creations in the real world. The Audi R8 V10 Spyder also takes on the Porsche 911 Turbo Cabriolet on the test track, and American actor Andy Garcia does a lap in the Reasonably Priced Car

programme.title: Stranded on Honeymoon Island: Australia
programme.desc: On the sixth day on the islands, another crate washes up on shore which aims to help the couples move to the next level of intimacy. Drama unfolds for some of the newlyweds as the crate unearths deep insecurities and difficult questions

programme.title: Stranded on Honeymoon Island: Australia
programme.desc: As the couples hit a week stranded together, another orange crate with videos from the speed-dating event washes ashore. The videos prove to be a test of strength for each couple and an indication of jealous tendencies

programme.title: Stranded on Honeymoon Island: Australia
programme.desc: Halfway through their adventures, some relationships are flourishing while others teeter on the edge. The aftermath of Couples Cove casts a shadow and a message in a bottle ignites anticipation, prompting the couples to embark on unprecedented double dates

programme.title: Blackmailed: The Sextortion Killers
programme.desc: Reporter Tir Dhondy investigates the rise of sextortion scams targeting teenage boys on social media, including the case of 16-year-old victim Evan Boettler. Her journey leads to Nigeria, where she confronts the scammers taking part in these crimes. With unprecedented access and interviews with industry insiders, Tir exposes a disturbing online underworld and its devastating consequences

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May build their own versions of motorhomes and set off for a bank holiday weekend in the West Country to try out their creations in the real world. The Audi R8 V10 Spyder also takes on the Porsche 911 Turbo Cabriolet on the test track, and American actor Andy Garcia does a lap in the Reasonably Priced Car

programme.title: Missing in Paradise: Searching for Sarm
programme.desc: Journalist Tir Dhondy investigates the disappearance of Sarm Heslop, who went missing from a luxury Caribbean charter yacht in 2021. Tire retraces Sarms last known movements and tracks down two boat captains whose vessels were moored near the yacht she vanished from. Also, she gets to question Ryan Banes, Sarms boyfriend, account of what happened what happened through his lawyer David Cattie

programme.title: Juice
programme.desc: The new Jamma is reliable and consistent - he wants to respect Guys boundaries, but also needs Saifs address from Guy so he can try to reconnect with his father. Winnies dad is visiting for some quality father-daughter bonding, but shes not yet come out as straight to him and asks Isaac to play along. Comedy, starring Mawaan Rizwan, Russell Tovey and Emily Lloyd-Saini

programme.title: Juice
programme.desc: Guy and Jamma visit Guys family home to pick up his childhood diary for writing inspiration. When Jamma meets Guys mother and brother, he makes a perfect first impression, much to Guys despair. However, all hell breaks loose when an unwelcome guest makes a frightening and confronting appearance. Mark Gatiss guest stars, with Mawaan Rizwan, Russell Tovey and Emily Lloyd-Saini

programme.title: Juice
programme.desc: Guys book launch finds the venue double-booked with a wedding. When the bride goes missing, its Jammas time to shine - he goes to look for her to save both the launch and the wedding. Elsewhere, its still awkward between Winnie and Isaac after their near kiss, while Farida uses the launch as her chance to get Saif to sign the divorce papers. Comedy, starring Mawaan Rizwan, Russell Tovey and Emily Lloyd-Saini

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.sub-title: Horrible Histories: Its a Wicked World Special
programme.desc: Compilation of characters from around the globe, including Genghis Khan and Confucius, as well as a dance-off during a naval battle and a Bollywood number from Queen Victoria

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: A selection of monarchs, emperors and political leaders from the series, including naughty Napoleon annoying his Josephine, and horrid Henry VIII getting married - again. Plus, a song from wily Winston Churchill. Starring Rowan Atkinson, Kevin Eldon, Ben Miller and Tom Rosenthal

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: The presenters hit the road in a Jensen-Healey, a Lotus and a TVR as they chart the decline of the British sports car industry, on a journey from Norfolk to Blackpool. On the test track, Jeremy Clarkson enthuses about the Ferrari 458 Italia, and actor Jeff Goldblum is the Star in a Reasonably Priced Car

programme.title: Our Girl
programme.desc: The military drama returns, this time following experienced army medic Lance Corporal Georgie Lane as she joins Captain James and 2 Section at a refugee camp near the border of Somalia. However, when an aid worker is kidnapped, Georgies determination to find her places her in great danger. Starring Michelle Keegan and Luke Pasqualino

programme.title: Film Club
programme.desc: Drama, starring Aimee Lou Wood and Nabhaan Rizwan as best friends retreating from reality into a world of movies. However, change is coming to their lives whether they like it or not

programme.title: Film Club
programme.desc: While Noa attends a taster day for his new job in Bristol, Evie pulls out all the stops for Film Club - theres a lot riding on tonight. Drama, starring Aimee Lou Wood and Nabhaan Rizwan

programme.title: Twisted Metal
programme.desc: Post-apocalyptic comedy based on the turbo-charged PlayStation video game franchise. In the future, cyberterrorism has devastated entire continents and survivors of the technological meltdown create walled fortresses to protect from lawlessness and further attacks. Couriers known as milkmen drive their souped-up cars across danger-filled wastelands to ferry goods between the citadels. One milkman, John Doe, accepts an assignment from New San Franciscos chief operating officer Raven to collect a valuable consignment from New Chicago. If successful, John will be granted citizenship. The mission takes John though Las Vegas where he encounters resourceful car thief Quiet. They joins forces to outrun a psychopathic clown named Sweet Tooth, who controls the desert strip

programme.title: Twisted Metal
programme.desc: John finds his mission thwarted by two unpredictable adversaries in Lost Vegas. Agent Stone recruits new members for his cause

programme.title: Walk the Line
programme.desc: Biopic of country singer Johnny Cash. Traumatised by the death of his brother as a child and scorned by his father, Cash leaves Arkansas to serve in the US Air Force in Germany, where he starts to write songs. Although reaching a high point in his career touring alongside Elvis and Jerry Lee Lewis, he descends into drink and drug addiction, while fellow singer and future wife June Carter seems to be the only person standing between him and self-destruction. With Joaquin Phoenix and an Oscar-winning Reese Witherspoon

programme.title: Missing in Paradise: Searching for Sarm
programme.desc: Tir Dhondy meets with island police and is given CCTV footage that has never been released, showing Sarms last known movements with her boyfriend, Ryan Bane

programme.desc: Round-up of the days headlines from around the world

programme.title: Portugal with Michael Portillo
programme.desc: Michaels journey continues in Portugals oldest city, Braga, and its oldest town founded in 1125, Ponte de Lima - both in the far north of the country, near its border with Spain. He is swept up in an evening of boisterous folk music and dancing in Ponte de Lima, at one of Portugals biggest annual festivals - the Feiras Novas - which attracts up to a million revellers over three days of dancing, drinking and processions. This section of his journey then ends on the streets of Braga with belly dancers who have revived the ancient art that is thought to first have migrated to northern Portugal with the arrival of the Romans

programme.desc: The case of William and Patricia Wycherley, an unassuming couple who vanished from their Mansfield home in 1998, leaving neighbours oblivious to the sinister truth. The arrival of a 100th birthday card after more than a decade set in motion a series of events that exposed a horrific murder, and as police investigated the cold case, they unearthed a complex web of lies - and the unlikely people responsible

programme.desc: The actor and his son embark a 3,000-mile journey through Europe, aiming to experience extremes from the fiery heat of the Mediterranean to the icy tundras of the Arctic Circle. programme.desc: The experiment hits the next phase, as friends and family visit the couples for in-laws week, providing a breakthrough for one couple in need of intervention

programme.title: Rude(ish) Tube
programme.desc: Featuring a variety of cats doing strange things, soldiers stuck in the sand and a dog balancing on a rope

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The long-running animation reaches its 500th episode. Homer and his family are forced to leave town and live as outcasts after angering the people of Springfield one too many times. Helping them adjust to their new life is WikiLeaks founder Julian Assange, while the cartoons theme is given a makeover by singer Alison Krauss

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The guys invite the girls to a Dungeons and Dragons night when their trip to Vegas falls through after an incident with airport security. However, following a few drinks, Sheldon and Amys relationship takes an unexpected turn. Meanwhile, Raj goes on a date with Lucy, who tries to sneak out of the restaurants bathroom window - but ends up getting stuck and calling for his help

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard is offered an exciting job opportunity, but it will mean he has to leave the country for several months. Penny tries to support his ambitions, while Sheldon is jealous and attempts to discourage him from accepting the post. Meanwhile, Raja pushes the boundaries with Lucy, but puts their relationship in jeopardy

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Cameron is delighted to accept the role of interim music director at Luke and Mannys school, but his enthusiasm fails to rub off on the students. Meanwhile, Jays brother Donnie (guest star Jonathan Banks) comes to town, but their sibling rivalry goes too far, and Phil persuades his family to appear in his new advert

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Mitchell and Cameron seek legal guardians for Lily and begin secretly assessing their family members. The duos decision is made difficult, however, when they catch Jay dishing out tough love to Manny, and find out that Clare has been taking Luke to a child psychologist due to his lack of development

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Howard receives shocking news as everyone prepares for the re-opening of the comic-book store. Penny tries to teach Sheldon how to let it go, but she is unable to follow her own advice when she learns something infuriating about Amy. Comedy, guest starring Nathan Fillion, with Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon and Penny agree to participate in an unusual experiment, and Leonard, Amy, Raj and Emily spend the evening trying to escape from a zombie. Elsewhere, Howard and Bernadette run into trouble at the airport after returning from Mrs Wolowitzs funeral. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Trouble arises when Amy learns that Sheldon has applied for a one-way mission to colonise Mars. Meanwhile, Leonard surprises Penny with a gift, and Raj decides to snoop around Emilys flat after she is called back to work during their evening together. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard is upset when a magazine fails to mention him in an article about the paper he co-wrote with Sheldon. Meanwhile, a power cut at Mrs Wolowitzs home leads to a final family dinner in her honour. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Peralta is called upon to negotiate a hostage situation with a jewel thief, only to discover that the culprit is a familiar face. Santiago and Gina help Boyle with the demands of his new food truck business, and Holt panics when a member of the selection committee for the Police Commissioner post decides to interview Hitchcock

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Peralta prepares for an all-night interrogation in the hope of securing a confession from a stubborn suspect. However, when Captain Holt sacrifices an evening at the opera to stay behind at the precinct and help, the two officers clash over how to make the man talk. Cop comedy, starring Andy Samberg and Andre Braugher

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The family relocates to an abandoned farm, where Homer discovers he has a talent for growing tomatoes - which prove highly addictive and soon attract the attention of unscrupulous rival businesses. Featuring the guest voices of the B-52s

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer bowls a perfect 300 game and becomes a local hero, giving speeches to classes of schoolchildren and appearing on TV show Springfield Squares - but it is not long before fame goes to his head. With the voices of Penn and Teller and Ron Howard

programme.title: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: The experiment hits the next phase, as friends and family visit the couples for in-laws week, providing a breakthrough for one couple in need of intervention

programme.title: Rude(ish) Tube
programme.desc: Comedy clips showcasing amusing internet videos, featuring school, a spelling competition and ninjas

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: After more than five years of dating, Sheldon and Amy spend their first night together, while Leonard, Howard and Raj must decide who will take their extra Star Wars movie ticket. Plus, Sheldons Obi-Wan advises him on his difficult relationship decisions. Starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco, with recurring guest star Bob Newhart

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer falls out with Marge over revelations contained in an old letter, and moves into the home of a gay couple who keep him happy by plying him with food. With the guest voice of Weird Al Yankovic

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The family spends Christmas on a ranch, where Lisa falls in love with an older boy, and Homer and Bart help locals protesting against a dam built by industrious beavers. Featuring the guest voices of David Byrne, Jonathan Taylor Thomas and Andy Serkis

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: The village holds a vigil for the serial killers victims, Cleo visits Joel in prison, a hurting mother admits her true feelings, and a resident receives unexpected flattery

programme.title: Hollyoaks At 30: Most Explosive Episodes
programme.desc: A classic episode of Hollyoaks ahead of the soaps 30th anniversary. As celebration turns to tragedy on the party train, who will survive the devastation? Maxine goes into labour, but relief turns to fear when her saviour leaves her life hanging in the balance

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: First to open the restaurant doors is 26-year-old Mabel, who describes herself as an alpha female and has been single for four years. Mabel has come to the restaurant in the hope of ending her search and meeting a man who can handle her. Lion, her date, is a self-proclaimed lion by name and nature. Seventy-year-old tour guide Sonya has been widowed for 15 years and is looking for a man who she can call her best friend and share experiences with. Her date, 69-year-old film rigger Graham, is looking for a romance fit for the silver screen. The pair hit it off immediately as they bond on being young at heart. Twenty-six-year-old florist Charlotte is passionate about her work. She hasnt had much time to date recently but is set on changing that and is hoping that tonight will be her first step to finding a relationship. Charlottes date is 29-year-old Adam, a data analyst from Blackpool who has taken some time out from dating after a recent heartache but is ready to get back in the game

programme.title: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: Two more brave singles take a gamble on love at the altar, but will the new brides high-speed approach prove too much for her laidback groom? Meanwhile, in-laws week continues

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: Anna Richardson hosts the full-frontal dating show, and first into the studio is 23-year-old trans woman Callie from Glasgow, who is looking for a man who is proud to have her on his arm. Next up is 24-year-old product design engineer Luca from Edinburgh, a part-time model who is hoping to find his perfect muse

programme.title: Open House: The Great Sex Experiment
programme.desc: Welsh couple Jonny and Sarah have been trying to open up for two years, but keep bottling out at the last minute. Will they be able to overcome their nerves and how will Jonny feel if he needs to share Sarah with another man? Tanith and Paul have to confront the fact that their partners Mark and Chloe had sex with multiple people on their first night at the retreat, while they went back to their bedrooms alone. With a second night ahead, it remains to be seen whether they can yet partake in sex with their partners and other people

programme.title: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: Two more brave singles take a gamble on love at the altar, but will the new brides high-speed approach prove too much for her laidback groom? Meanwhile, in-laws week continues

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The armchair critics share their opinions on The Great British Bake Off, Vigil, Changing Rooms, Sex Actually with Alice Levine, This Morning and Michel Rouxs French Country Cooking. They also offer their opinions on the gas crisis and the relaxation of travel restrictions, as reported by the BBC and ITV. From September 2021

programme.title: Below Deck
programme.desc: Ben deals with the fallout from disrespecting Captain Kerry, while the crew do their best to end the season strong. Kyle struggles to keep his clothes on, to Barbies dismay

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer suffers a bout of incontinence and has to wear a nappy, forcing Marge to ask eccentric boffin Professor Frink to help determine the cause of his condition. With the use of a dream machine, Frink breaks into Homers subconscious mind where a string of insecurities are exposed, including one involving his late mother

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer manages to become the owner of the power plant and, in a rare display of intelligence and ingenuity, he celebrates his new-found prestige by sacking former boss Mr Burns - who does not take kindly to being ousted

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: Scuse Me While I Miss the Sky

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny gets more than she bargained for when Leonard agrees to meet a psychiatrist on her behalf, while Sheldon and Raj collaborate on an astronomical discovery. Stuart moves out, but Howard and Bernadettes happiness is short-lived. Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco star

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo enjoys a ukulele lesson in Haddington, East Lothian, birthplace of the Victorian self-improvement guru Samuel Smiles. In Musselburgh, he gets a taste of life as a fishwife, before exploring Edinburgh where a popular 19th-century mode of transport is making a comeback. Michael also visits the Royal College of Surgeons, where he discovers the macabre history of body snatchers and murderers and heads onwards to the University of Edinburgh Medical School, to learn how students use sophisticated technology to study anatomy

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo embarks on train journeys through Edwardian Britain, exploring the grand estates of Norfolk and a bivouac on Brownsea Island on the way. He also learns the ropes aboard an Edwardian wherry on the Norfolk Broads

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo heads to Chichester, West Sussex, where he encounters an Edwardian motoring duo patronised by King Edward VII. After a grand tour of their factory, he is treated to some rest and relaxation in one of their finest vehicles. Arriving in the resort of Southsea, Hampshire, Michael heads for the Kings Theatre, where he treads the boards in a community production of Lads in the Village. Crossing the Solent, the presenter boards the Island Line to travel along the pier in a 1930s London Underground carriage, then hops on to the Isle of Wight heritage line bound for Wootton

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo continues his journey from Northern Ireland across the water to Scotland. Leaving from the seaport of Larne, he reaches Stranraer and the Mull of Galloway, where in a lighthouse built by railway engineer Robert Stevenson he discovers a magnificent machine, installed at the turn of the 20th-century

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.sub-title: Letchworth Garden City to Herne Hill
programme.desc: Michael Portillo explores an Edwardian utopia in Letchworth, where he meets a fourth generation citizen who introduces him to the towns community spirit. He then heads towards London, and discovers a favoured haunt of King Edward VII, before sampling the monarchs favourite tipple, the Kings Ginger

programme.title: The Desert Fox
programme.desc: German commander Rommel falls out of favour with Hitler following his defeat at El Alamein. On returning to his homeland, he is torn between his oath of loyalty and lack of faith in the Fuehrers unstable leadership, prompting him to become involved in an assassination plot. Second World War drama, starring James Mason, Jessica Tandy, Cedric Hardwicke, Leo G Carroll and Luther Adler

programme.title: Anastasia
programme.desc: In 1920s Paris, exiled Russians claim they have found the daughter of the last Tsar, who was originally believed to have been killed with the rest of her family. She is taken into the care of a General and groomed until she can convince Anastasias cousin Prince Paul that she is genuinely the tsarina and inherit a fortune. Historical drama, starring an Oscar-winning Ingrid Bergman, and Yul Brynner

programme.title: Pool of London
programme.desc: A sailor learns his involvement in smuggling has made him the chief suspect in a murder case, and reluctantly goes on the run. Ealing thriller, starring Bonar Colleano, Susan Shaw, Renee Asherson and James Robertson Justice

programme.title: Rio Grande
programme.desc: A cavalry officer has to avoid showing preferential treatment when the son he has not seen for 15 years is posted to his fort as a cadet. His estranged wife also turns up wanting to take the boy away, but he is forced to put duty before his family when called on to rescue children kidnapped by Apaches on the Mexican border. John Fords Western, with John Wayne, Maureen OHara, Ben Johnson and J Carrol Naish

programme.title: Flight of the Phoenix
programme.desc: The crew and passengers of a cargo plane are left stranded in the Gobi desert after a crash. They embark on a desperate plan to return to civilisation - by building a new plane out of the wreckage of the old one. Action adventure remake, starring Dennis Quaid, Tyrese Gibson, Giovanni Ribisi, Miranda Otto and Hugh Laurie

programme.title: Top Gun: Maverick
programme.desc: Pete Maverick Mitchell returns to the Top Gun Instructor programme, where he must confront his past as he trains a group of younger pilots for a deadly mission. Among them is the son of Mavericks deceased best friend, Lieutenant Nick Goose Bradshaw. Director Joseph Kosinskis Oscar-winning action drama, starring Tom Cruise, Jennifer Connelly, Miles Teller, Val Kilmer, Bashir Salahuddin and Glen Powell

programme.title: Io Capitano
programme.desc: Two young boys, Seydou and Moussa, leave Dakar to reach Europe for a better life. Drama, starring Seydou Sarr and Moustapha Fall. In Wolof, French, Arabic and Italian with English subtitles

programme.title: The Guard
programme.desc: A laidback Irish policeman has a sharp mind for detective work, but a less than dedicated attitude to enforcing the law. His simple life is disrupted when he is forced to work with an uptight FBI agent in pursuit of an international drug-smuggling operation. Comedy thriller, with Brendan Gleeson, Don Cheadle and Mark Strong

programme.title: A Lawless Street
programme.desc: A long-serving marshal, who has done his utmost to the keep peace in the town of Medicine Bend, looks forward to a reconciliation with his estranged wife, a touring musical star. Just as she arrives in town, three notorious criminals show up and start causing trouble - and the lawman has to decide whether to hang up his guns for his wifes sake or do his duty. Western, with Randolph Scott, Angela Lansbury, Jean Parker and Warner Anderson

programme.title: The Frogmen
programme.desc: Underwater demolition experts embark on a mission to find a safe landing site for the US military to launch an invasion on a South Pacific island occupied by Japanese army and navy forces. But first the commander and his men must put aside their personal differences to ensure the mission is successful. Thriller, starring Richard Widmark, Dana Andrews and Gary Merrill

programme.title: Henry VIII and His Six Wives
programme.desc: The Tudor monarch looks back on his tumultuous reign as he lies on his deathbed. He remembers the six women he made his queen, and how the series of unsuccessful marriages impacted on the political state of England and led to the downfall of some of his most trusted allies. Historical drama, starring Keith Michell, Donald Pleasence, Charlotte Rampling and Brian Blessed

programme.title: The Violent Men
programme.desc: A ruthless cattle baron sets out to create his own private empire, no matter what the cost. When he resorts to murder, he makes an enemy of a civil war veteran, while his lust for power drives his wife into the arms of his younger brother. Western, starring Edward G Robinson, Barbara Stanwyck and Glenn Ford

programme.title: Fatherhood
programme.desc: A father brings up his baby girl as a single dad after the unexpected death of his wife who died a day after their daughters birth. Comedy drama, starring Kevin Hart and Alfre Woodard

Space age pilot Mills suffers a catastrophic mechanical failure at the controls of his craft and crash-lands on a mysterious planet. Armed with limited munitions, he deduces that he is stranded on Earth 65 million years ago when dinosaurs ruled the third rock from the sun. Action adventure, starring Adam Driver and Ariana Greenblatt

programme.title: Glory
programme.desc: Fact-based historical drama chronicling the story of the first all-black regiment to fight in the American Civil War, and the inexperienced officer given the job of training the men and leading them into battle. Starring Matthew Broderick, Cary Elwes, Morgan Freeman and Denzel Washington, who received an Oscar for his performance

programme.title: And Then We Danced
programme.desc: Merab and Irakli dance for the National Georgian Ensemble in Tbilisi. They begin a relationship, but are forced to keep it a secret because of the rigidly macho world in which they work. Drama, starring Levan Gelbakhiani and Bachi Valishvili. In Georgian with English subtitles

programme.desc: After killing a Holcomb brother, Marshal Vern Fawcett resigns to be with his family. Theres no rest though as Hollister sends him to Tucson to deal with the vengeful Holcombs

programme.title: The Quick Gun
programme.desc: A reformed outlaw who left his hometown in disgrace returns to claim his late fathers ranch. The prodigal son decides to make amends for his past crimes by defending the settlement. Western, starring Audie Murphy and Merry Anders

programme.desc: Two undercover agents are shot at QQF Incorporated, with one surviving long enough to warn of imminent danger. The duo soon realise that someone is after Prince Ali of Barabia, who is visiting London, with Mrs Peel joining his harem. Ron Moody guest stars

programme.title: The New Avengers
programme.desc: The team gets a clue about the identity of Russias most effective spy. The trail of Agent X41, codename Scapina, takes Steed and his colleagues to Toronto. Patrick Macnee stars

programme.title: The Marine
programme.desc: A soldier is forcibly discharged from duty after violating orders, and soon has a personal battle to fight when his wife is kidnapped by the leader of a gang of diamond thieves, who leads the enraged soldier on a chase through the South Carolinian wilderness. Action thriller, starring John Cena, Robert Patrick and Kelly Carlson

programme.title: Maximum Security
programme.desc: The CIA enlists a professional thief to break into the safe at a maximum-security Mexican prison and retrieve sensitive information being stored there. But all hell breaks loose when a local drug lord, whose confiscated millions are also stored there, sends in teams of thugs to siege the facility and steal back his cash before anyone else gets to it. Thriller, starring Dolph Lundgren, Corbin Bernsen and Louis Mandylor

programme.title: The Dog House

programme.title: 24 Hours in AandE
programme.desc: Cameras follow patients at south-west Londons St Georges hospital on Harry and Meghans wedding day in May 2018. As the happy couple tie the knot, patients and their relatives reflect on the meaning of lifelong love, devotion and commitment. programme.title: 24 Hours in AandE

Heading through Mississippi, Jimmy and Matt find out what makes southern sweet tea different from a British cuppa. In Alabama, Matt wants to know why they fry green tomatoes, and Jimmy uncovers exactly what grits are. Donatello (voiced by Micah Abbey), Leonardo (Nicolas Cantu), Michelangelo (Shamon Brown Jr) and Raphael (Brady Noon) experience the usual growing pains of teenagers while contending with the media spotlight. Sonic is trapped in a multiverse of mayhem with different iterations of his friends Amy Rose (Shannon Chan-Kent), Knuckles (Adam Nurada), Rouge (Kazumi Evans) and Tails (Ashleigh Ball). programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: The heroes in a half shell come to terms with their new roles as saviours of New York City in an animated series set shortly after the events chronicled in the film Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutant Mayhem. Donatello (voiced by Micah Abbey), Leonardo (Nicolas Cantu), Michelangelo (Shamon Brown Jr) and Raphael (Brady Noon) experience the usual growing pains of teenagers while contending with the media spotlight. Building on their friendship with aspiring reporter April ONeil (Ayo Edebiri), the reptilian quartet face brilliant inventor Bishop (Alanna Ubach), who believes mutants are the greatest danger facing humankind and must be eliminated. Meanwhile, pampered rich kid Rod (Pete Davison) yearns to be a mutant and leverages his wealth and connections to achieve a dangerous dream

programme.title: Sonic Prime
programme.desc: The wise-cracking blue hedgehog, made famous by a series of popular video games on Sega consoles, continues his computer-animated adventures through the Shatterverse. At the end of the first series, the eponymous spiny mammal (voiced by Deven Mack) learnt from black hedgehog Shadow (Ian Hanlin) that the original version of Green Hill no longer exists. Sonic is trapped in a multiverse of mayhem with different iterations of his friends Amy Rose (Shannon Chan-Kent), Knuckles (Adam Nurada), Rouge (Kazumi Evans) and Tails (Ashleigh Ball). Sonic and Shadow must put aside their differences and work together to repair the temporal damage and outwit diabolical scientist Dr Eggman (Brian Drummond)

programme.desc: Sheldon and Amy stay up all night as they await a telephone call that could bring big news from the Nobel Committee - is everything in their lives about to change?

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: Australian soap opera, charting the lives and loves of the residents in the Melbourne suburb of Erinsborough

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Roo is at Adrians doorstep, Eden and Remi blow up, and Alf keeps Cohen in the dark

programme.title: Son of a Critch
programme.desc: A bittersweet coming-of-age comedy set in 1980s Newfoundland based on Canadian comedian and actor Mark Critchs memoir of the same title. The pint-sized hero is 11-year-old Mark, who grows up in St Johns with his radio reporter father Mike, mother Mary, older brother Mike Jr and grandfather Patrick. Mark nervously prepares to enter junior high school and he makes a new best friend, Ritche Perez.

programme.title: Kayak o Thuaidh
programme.desc: Tessa Fleming and Irial Ó Ceallaigh embark on the final leg of their journey around the northern coast of Ireland, surfing at Downhill Beach before setting off along the Derry coast towards Portstewart and into Co Antrims coastal waters. During the final exhausting slog across to the spectacular wildlife haven of Rathlin Island, the pair reflect on the achievement of completing a journey of a lifetime. In Irish

programme.title: Na Feilte Tine
programme.desc: A look at Lúnasa, the celebration of the harvest and the ancient sun god Lú that marks the beginning of the final arc in the Gaelic calendar. In Carrick on Shannon, Edwina Guckian leads an Irish Culture Retreat where she guides guests through the traditions of the festival that is still celebrated in Leitrim today

programme.title: Am I Being Unreasonable?
programme.desc: A revelation about Nic sends her spiralling into panic and causes shockwaves throughout her family and friends. Does this mean her worst fears have come true and shes ruined her sons life? Is everything unravelling or can she get away with murder?

programme.title: Lioness
programme.desc: While Joe subjects her to intense training to prepare her for the missions challenges, Cruz starts to build a relationship with the daughter of a dangerous man. Joes daughter Kate gets into a fight during a football game, and her husband Neal has to deliver some difficult news to a patient

programme.title: The 2 Johnnies Late Night Lock In
programme.desc: Comedy and entertainment from the Tipperary duo, with a lively and unpredictable mix of celebrity guests, live music, silly games and stand-up comedy

programme.title: Amanda and Alans Italian Job
programme.desc: Amanda Holden and Alan Carr transform the courtyard into a Mediterranean oasis. To brush up on their botany, the pair visit the magnificent gardens of one of Sicilys biggest wine producers, where they help out with the grape harvest. Keen to create an authentic Sicilian design, Alan explores Sciaccas famous ceramic scene and gets arty painting Moor Heads. He also enlists the help of two baroque-style painters to bring a touch of the islands rich history with a surprise courtyard centrepiece. Amanda repairs the old courtyard walls, which turns out to be a far bigger job than anticipated

programme.title: Amanda and Alans Italian Job
programme.desc: Amanda Holden aims to bring a slice of Hollywood to Sicily with a banana leaf-patterned boudoir as she takes the reins designing the master bedroom. Alan Carr is concerned her camp theme is on the wrong side of tacky, so she takes him to visit one of Palermos most prestigious hotels to show how exuberant decor has enticed high-profile guests including famous composer Richard Wagner. To bring her vision to life, Amanda ropes in her DIY-loving father to help build a bespoke four-poster bed. Alan, meanwhile, learns to kick back like the Italians do, with a lesson in the art of doing nothing

programme.title: First Dates Hotel
programme.desc: Twenty-seven-year-old salesman James is paired with 31-year-old Serena, who is looking for a reformed bad boy after a history of dating disasters. Fifty-year-old cancer survivor Sara is impressed with her match, fellow fitness fanatic Peter, and 39-year-old singleton Rose opens up about her Crohns disease to her date Jordan - something she always does on a first date to see if men are put off

programme.title: Irelands Fittest Family

programme.title: Mancháns Europe by Train
programme.desc: Manchán Magan embraces the ethos of slow travel, taking the time to get to know people and places, and experiencing local customs and traditions. He takes a 100mph zipline ride across a Welsh quarry, takes part in a Congolese dance at a party in Brussels, cycles through treetops on an innovative Belgian trail and visits a floating farm in Rotterdam

programme.desc: Dee Coleman and builder Pete Finn help the Dalton family in Lucan reclaim their cluttered semi-detached home. Dad Peter lost an arm in an industrial accident and mum Jane has problems with her knee, so the current clutter only exacerbates their daily struggles. Added to that, they all play instruments, but most of these are consigned to the attic. Can Dee and Pete clear things out and rearrange the Daltons lives?

programme.title: Boardwalk Empire

Meanwhile, Nucky tries to investigate some of his political rivals
